ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: What I do when i fight is if the battle goes on long enough i will play the stamina song once or twice throughout the battle.. and your stamina wont be as
ygData.messageBody:
What I do when i fight is if the battle goes on long enough i will play the
stamina song once or twice throughout the battle.. and your stamina wont be
as low.. might wanna try that


----- Original Message -----
From: Keith G. Spencer <kgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 15, 1999 12:18 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Staff of Writhing


> From: "Keith G. Spencer" <kgs@...>
>
> They come out of Nagafen's Lair (Solusek B)
>
> I traded a crafted helm for mine, but I think I got a great deal, normally
I
> think they go for 300-500p
>
> You can only wield it in your primary hand. It's fairly heavy and will
> cause a decent amount of stamina drain (I wield it & a silvery 1h axe -
> after about 3 fights in a row, I'm at 0 stamina)
>
> Not sure what the minimum lvl to proc is.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Sunday, August 15, 1999 10:32 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] Staff of Writhing
>
>
> >From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>
> >
> >I have decided to make it my goal to attain a staff of writhing because
> >I cant imagine anything looking better than someone in platemail armor
> >weilding a staff with a skull on top and a sword in his other hand.
> >Problem is I dont know where i can find one or about how much they sell
> >for. Anyone have any ideas? Also, what level must you be before the proc
> >starts going off and can you equip it in your secondary hand slot?
> >thanks
> >
> >Flatliner Shadowsong, Tunare
> >
> >
